Charles.

Professor!

I’ve decided to

return to England.

What?

Without the Beagle’s official naturalist how will we complete our nature surveys?

Well, they’ve still got you, haven’t they? You’ve got more passion

and much more ability than I.

I’m naming you naturalist on this voyage.

Professor.

With the departure of

the Professor, Darwin became the new official naturalist of the Beagle.

I have a lot more responsibility now.

On July 5, 1832, the Beagle set sail

for Buenos Aires.

83
